txt.en:
Muirál can be found at Bail Avarc in Angmar.

You have done much to aid those opposing the Iron Crown at Carn Dûm. You should talk to Muirál.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Bail Avarc can initially only be accessed via stable-master routes. Bail Avarc can be reached via the stable-masters at Esteldín, Gath Forthnír, and the stables of Rivendell.</rgb>
Talk to Muirál at Bail Avarc
The Hill-men of Angmar and their allies work to oppose the remnants of the Iron Crown who dwell again within the walls of Carn Dûm.

'Hail, [placeholder].

'Are you here to join the fight against the Iron Crown? There are vile things afoot at Sant Lhoer, Thaurisgar, Sagroth, and within the halls of Gwathrenost.

'If you aid us in hindering the Iron Crown's efforts in Carn Dûm, we would welcome your aid.'


<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: To advance this quest, you must complete one of the following on any group Size or difficulty Tier: 'Sant Lhoer, the Poison Gardens', 'Thaurisgar, the Vile Apothecary', 'Sagroth, Lair of Vermin', or 'Gwathrenost, the Witch-king's Citadel'.</rgb>
'You have my thanks, [placeholder].\n\n'If we continue to fight against the Iron Crown, it will not be long before we overcome them!'
Complete one of the Angmar Reborn instances:

You should aid the Hill-men of Angmar and work to oppose the Iron Crown in Carn Dûm.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: To advance this quest, you must complete one of the following on any group Size or difficulty Tier: 'Sant Lhoer, the Poison Gardens', 'Thaurisgar, the Vile Apothecary', 'Sagroth, Lair of Vermin', or 'Gwathrenost, the Witch-king's Citadel'.</rgb>
Complete 'Sant Lhoer, the Poison Gardens', 'Thaurisgar, the Vile Apothecary', 'Sagroth, Lair of Vermin', or 'Gwathrenost, the Witch-king's Citadel'
